name: Burning Love
description:
"All I did was stick a bloody knife in a skull!! What did I do?!"

In the midst of cleaning Akademi High School, you stumble upon a bloody knife in the Occult Room. Not wanting to get in trouble, you stick the knife in the Occult Club's skull figure, but you wind up teleporting to a plane you don't recognize.

You come face to face with a demon, head completely covered in a white flame...

And you can't help but want to make out with him.

Can you woo the Flame Demon?!

CREDITS:

Script - YandereDev and Michaela Laws
Programming - Michaela Laws
Flame Demon - Patrick Seymour
Ayano - Michaela Laws
Art by MulberryDreamer

BGs from Yandere Simulator and Uncle Mugen
Music from Yandere Simulator and Kevin Macleod
